name: BBCWorld
text:
Two people are dead and one injured after a shooting on the third night of protests in Kenosha, Wisconsin

The protests were sparked by the police shooting of Jacob Blake, a black man
 
This is what we know, so far

[Thread] 

https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3

name: BBCWorld
text:
Jacob Blake was shot several times in the back by police on Sunday in the US city of Kenosha
 
Police say they were responding to a domestic incident, but many details remain unclear
 
Mr Blake‚Äôs fiancee says his three children saw the whole thing

https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3 https://t.co/t0iL744vVj

name: BBCWorld
text:
A bystander, who filmed the incident, told media that before he began filming he saw police wrestle, punch and Taser Mr Blake
 
He also said he heard police officers shout "Drop the knife!", but he didn't see a knife in Mr Blake's hands
https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3

name: BBCWorld
text:
Mr Blake was taken to hospital and his family say he is paralysed from the waist down - doctors do not know if he will recover
 
The family want the officer who shot Mr Blake arrested and other officers involved in the incident fired 
https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3 https://t.co/NVm0kW8vAH

name: BBCWorld
text:
Within hours of Mr Blake's shooting on Sunday, hundreds marched on Kenosha's police headquarters
 
A night-time curfew has been imposed
 
On Monday, Wisconsin‚Äôs governor called in the National Guard to help local police 

https://t.co/VsJcqUFt3h https://t.co/UExrivWCdx

name: BBCWorld
text:
Cars have been set on fire, and there are reports of demonstrators hitting property with baseball bats
 
On Tuesday, a small group threw fireworks and water bottles at police, who responded with rubber bullets and tear gas 

https://t.co/VsJcqUFt3h https://t.co/hekvJvm5q3

name: BBCWorld
text:
Footage shared online showed a man with a rifle being chased by a crowd before he fell to the ground and appeared to fire at them
 
Other video shows armed civilians, many in military-style uniforms, congregating outside businesses they were 'protecting'

https://t.co/VsJcqUFt3h https://t.co/kpH5n4t27s

name: BBCWorld
text:
Protests have also spread to other cities across the US

https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3 https://t.co/r1MXnlx97c

text: Read more about Jacob Blake, and the protests following the incident https://t.co/bJKlLfPpe3
